channel.title: Qv2ray on KASUSA
channel.description: Recent content in Qv2ray on KASUSA

item.title: ubuntu安装Qv2ray
item.description: replace your source with tuna speed up apt-update : https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/help/ubuntu/ this is for ubuntu , but igeuss it will working well on other linux machines too. download Qv2ray here: https://github.com/Qv2ray/Qv2ray/releases download v2ray-core here (linux-64 ver):https://github.com/v2ray/v2ray-core/releases before open Appimage file you should give it permission! : chmod 777 * set up subscribe follow this instruction :https://qv2ray.net/getting-started/step3.html#通过订阅地址导入
item.content:
replace your source with tuna speed up apt-update : https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/help/ubuntu/

this is for ubuntu , but igeuss it will working well on other linux machines too.

  1. download Qv2ray here: https://github.com/Qv2ray/Qv2ray/releases
  2. download v2ray-core here (linux-64 ver):https://github.com/v2ray/v2ray-core/releases
  3. before open Appimage file you should give it permission! : chmod 777 *
  4. set up subscribe follow this instruction :https://qv2ray.net/getting-started/step3.html#通过订阅地址导入
